description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              - Gather, analyze, and summarize accurate data from various sources
              
              - Transfer data into information
              
              - Identify the market trends
              
              - Provide the information to marketing team in order to make an effective strategy
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              Education Level: Diploma in Information Technology or equivalent
              
              Experience Level: At least 02 years
              

              Required Experience/Skills Detail
              
              - Candidate must possess Diploma in Information Technology or equivalent
              
              - Prefer candidates with professional experience in data management and analysis
              
              - Able to work independently under minimal supervision
              
              - Good at English
              
              - Excellent communication and collaboration with different divisions
              
              - Highly self motivated and ambitious in achieving goals
              

              How To Contact:
              
              Apply Online, Apply by Attachment, Direct (Trực Tuyến, Đính Kèm Qua Mail, Hoặc Trực Tiếp)
              
              Apply Online, Apply by Attachment resume with picture via VietnamWorks
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
